title: 我想問一下有關hell的問題 是不是我火星了
author: msc76ju3
txt_content: 在hell中放置床後點右鍵會爆炸!! 我想我一定是火星了...

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
熱烈歡迎朋友們光臨地球~~

WIKI中有提到~~

In Beta 1.6.2 Beds in the Nether were made to explode if used. This can be used as a mining technique. 

Beds will explode when a player attempts to sleep in one. This can be a useful strategy to quickly mine materials in the Nether, but only if the difficulty is set to peaceful.

replies.author: onlinejin
replies.txt_content: 因为在hell的时候，你不知道是早上还是晚上，所以你一按就爆了啊= =

replies.author: kk08923
replies.txt_content:
话说。。。那地方不叫HELL，叫NETHER.
有两个说法啊：
1.不能睡觉是因为minecraft设定是这样的
2.睡地狱的是SB，差点没炸死你。。。
